ComicInfo.Title: [Untitled]; Infinite Loop
ComicInfo.Summary:
Gumball and Darwin are having a totally relaxing day. No wacky misadventures, no getting into trouble...just enjoying each other's company and—oooh, Battle of the Bands!! They've gotta try out for that!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Missy Pena | 1 | B | Cover B | Jay Fosgitt | 2 | C | Cover C | Becky Dreistadt | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-25 19:52:24. [CVDB471369]

ComicInfo.Inker: Paulina Ganucheau, Tyson Hesse, Uwe Heidschötter
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Becky Dreistadt, Jay P. Fosgitt, Missy Pena
ComicInfo.Characters: Alan, Anton, Banana Joe, Bobert, Carmen, Coach, Darwin Watterson, Gumball Watterson, Leslie, Miss Simian, Principal Brown, Tina Rex
